solution_line_template: He has consumed {num_cookies} * {calories_per_cookie} = <<{num_cookies}*{calories_per_cookie}={calories_from_cookies}>>{calories_from_cookies} calories from the cookies.
He needs to consume {total_calories_needed} - {calories_from_cookies} = <<{total_calories_needed}-{calories_from_cookies}={remaining_calories_needed}>>{remaining_calories_needed} more calories.
